relevant_findings.neurological: Minimally verbal, clonus in the right leg, tremor in both arms; reflexes 1+.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Tender to palpation in the right lower quadrant; no distention, guarding, or rebound.
relevant_findings.cardiac: Grade 2/6 systolic murmur at left upper sternal border; grade 3/6 holosystolic murmur at apex.
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Scattered crackles heard in both lungs, loudest at the bases.
relevant_findings.dermatological: Erythematous sacrum; dry clean ulcer on right anterior tibial surface.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Blood pressure fell to 70 to 80 mm Hg during assessment.
Mental status worsened; developed respiratory distress requiring intubation.
